data.name: Transpose Cipher
data.description:
Complete a transpose cipher. A transpose cipher is written vertically with a specified depth then at the specified depth it is shifted to the next column to the right. The depth determines the number of words output.

Example text: "This is a cipher test"

Would be written like below. With depth of 4 (IGNORE SPACES AND CASE):


First word:

Depth - Word Array

1 - t

2 - h

3 - i

4 - s

-

Second word:

Depth - Word Array

1 - ti

2 - hs

3 - i

4 - s

-

Third word:

Depth - Word Array

1 - ti

2 - hs

3 - ia

4 - s

-

Fourth word:

Depth - Word Array

1 - tiir

2 - hsp

3 - iah

4 - sce

-

Fifth word:

Depth - Word Array

1 - tiirt

2 - hspt

3 - iahe

4 - sces

-


Final output:

tiirt hspt iahe sces
